EmailTemplate.name: 2019.09.23 - Implied Consent - Sept Blitz - Free Case of Paper.Implied Consent -
EmailTemplate.subject: Spend $250 & Get A Free Carton Of Paper!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spend $250 This Week and Get a Free* Carton of Boise Aspen Multi-use Recycled Paper Use code 1909FPPR
Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Big Deals Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 *Promo code 1909FPPR valid between Monday, September 23rd and Friday, September 29th and excludes purchases on furniture. One redemption per customer. Valid with purchases of $250 or more (before tax). Can't be used in conjunction with any other promo or offer. While quantities last. Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
